title: Variables
text: Represent the speeds using variables, Wayne's speed as x, Dennis's speed as $$x+7$$

title: Multiplication
text: Multiply the speed(in variable form) by its respective value.

title: Conversion
text: Now, translate the expressions that were multiplied by their monetary values into a single equation. This will be $$\operatorname{1.5}\left(x+7\right)=2(x)$$

title: Substitution
text: Plug x into the original relationship find $$x+7$$.

title: Calculation
text: The answer is 21 mph for Wayne and 28 mph for Dennis.
